评论概述: The one I wanted all along
评论详情: Soft and warm right out of the packaging. When you think of a dudes outdoor vest for throwing over a light hoodie this Is the one you're thinking of. Very nice job of keeping me warm without overheating, no complaints. I'm at the cusp of xl/2x, torso more square than round, so I ordered 2xl and it fits great. If you're at the upper end of 2xl I'd probably grab a 3x for the wiggle room.  Zero complaints. Feels sturdy, love the material, color is exactly as pictured. No unbecoming chemical or plastic smells was a plus. Zipper is super smooth no wrestling it at all, plus cozy pockets.  Worth.

评论概述: Looks great and keeps me warm.
评论详情: This is a great vest for the price. The color is nice and the material is not shiny which I am happy about. It fits well. I am 6'1" and 175lbs and purchased a medium and it fits well. Not too snug which I was worried about. Keeps my core warm and is great for Spring/Fall.  Only complaint is some "pouches" (not sure what to call them) are over stuffed. Had to return one of them because of this but the other one I received was fine with only a few areas of minimal over-stuffing.  Overall it looks great and you can't the price. Plan to buy another one in grey.
